name: Crimson Phoenix Rise
description:
Crimson Phoenix Rise is Metrovania Platfomer on PC that allows the player to choose the ending based upon their decisions in-game. Currently, I am seeking feedback on the game's mechanics and art style to further refine it, before releasing it in any official capacity. Please leave any constructive feedback in the comment section.


The game features:

A functional grappling hook
An inventory system
A global map
Melee Combat
Shooting Combat
And abilities that allow you to dodge


In this game, you'll need to master the gameplay mechanics to make it out of high stake situations on Mars.
